participant_1.name: Emma Johnson
participant_1.personality: Nurturing and creative, Emma finds joy in nature and often expresses her emotions through her gardening. She is cautious but has a warm heart.
participant_1.background: i was adopted at a young age to an older couple. i'm terrified of clowns due to childhood trauma. my father keeps trying to set me up on blind dates. i enjoy working with my hands and love gardening.

participant_2.name: Ryan Smith
participant_2.personality: A practical and grounded individual, Ryan has a quirky sense of humor that often shines through despite his fears. He values stability and has a passion for service.
participant_2.background: i'm terrified of scorpions. my favorite color is grey. i'm employed by the us postal service. my father drove a car for nascar.
